title: South Sudan President Salva Kiir fires army and police chiefs, central bank governor
description:
South Sudan President Salva Kiir fires army and police chiefs, central bank governor

Security sources with knowledge of the goings-on in the military said the changes could have stemmed from disquiet within the army ranks, adding that some soldiers had not been paid wages for about a year.

title: Cardinal sounds alarm on ‘unprecedented’ crisis in Sudan, South Sudan
description:
ACI Africa, Nov 11, 2025 / 14:56 pm

The president of the Sudan and South Sudan Catholic Bishops’ Conference (SSS-CBC) raised alarm over the deepening humanitarian crisis in the two neighboring countries of Sudan and South Sudan.

title: Co-op Bank inks South Sudan rural finance deal backed by Sh2.6b UNDP fund
description:

title: RBI Monetary Surveys: RBI Launches Key Consumer Surveys Ahead of June Policy Review
description:
RBI launches 3 key surveys for monetary policy input

The RBI normally holds six bi-monthly monetary policy reviews in a financial year. The last meeting was held earlier this month, and the next meeting of the Monetary Policy Committee is scheduled for June 4-6.
